ComicInfo.Penciller: Jeff Matsuda,Rob Liefeld,Sam Liu,Rob Liefeld,Sam Liu
ComicInfo.Summary:
Challenge!: Combat breaks into the booby trapped Temple of Assael to obtain an orb of power but finds that someone else has beaten him to it.
The Day After Part I: The day after young Thomas McCall drinks a secret formula developed by his father and is transformed into the hero known as Badrock, he escapes from his dad's lab and meets a monstrous creature in the sewers.
ComicInfo.Title: Challenge!; The Day After Part I
